S.FORM: 1878 ayaw cacay walu pitu walu a mihcan nu aidangan nu sakidaya kuyniyan ya talakaway nu cikasuwan a buyu` atu langlang dawayan a sauwac nu bilung takec sa miyamaw tadamanay a kakitidan sumilaw ku tahpu nu demiad u salengac nuladem tebing mala cuung I langdaway Nu tungdud nu buyu` u sakul kuy nayan u salungannay a nyadu` nu sakidaya tadiecsa ku pinacadan kaybaung tu paudipay Si pakelid paudipay kungalar nu tademaw ulicsa I kulus nu buyu` mi siwatid sadawdawbi`sa malecad tu mu dadiWay nu lalicay unika tatungtungdud nu dicem malecad tu duku nu malukay sa ahemaw kunisa diwang nu taludu` nu buyu`sa kuli nubuyu`malatenesay nu midangay Hay sadikud kasinuung ma hida u na kamuwan kasa lupiku nu dadan u tatungdud malalangdaway mala Langat I tap
